name: DICE KING (plasmatopia studio)
description:
this game is made for roll dice game jams in this game you can create whatever you want from maps and get creativity you can import or export maps manually

you can make any board game like snake and ladders and others

I won't tell you what you can create its all in your hands

this game is fully powered by turbowarp(scratch)

subscribe to my youtube channel for more

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0OcdfH_OGWIukQACQRdKDA
